column4: I installed a second HDD in my laptop. I only use it to store movies and stuff that the OS doesnt need to access. How do I turn the power off to the disk?
They do when they're idle...Though I just use external hard drives to deal with the power issue
I dont like externals. They are a little slower and the cheap ones need external power. I didnt make one that plugged into the laptops input and sucked power out of there.
